titleStmt.title: Vindiciæ pietatis: or, a vindication of godliness, in the greatest strictness and spirituality of it. From the imputations of folly and fancy Together with several directions for the attaining and maintaining of a godly life. By R.A.
Vindiciæ pietatis. Part 1-2
titleStmt.author: R. A. (Richard Alleine), 1611-1681.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
